bioconda.name: bioconductor-rcaspar
bioconda.summary: A package for survival time prediction based on a piecewise baseline hazard Cox regression model.

biotools.summary: The package is the R-version of the C-based software \bold{CASPAR}. It is meant to help predict survival times in the presence of high-dimensional explanatory covariates. The model is a piecewise baseline hazard Cox regression model with an Lq-norm based prior that selects for the most important regression coefficients, and in turn the most relevant covariates for survival analysis.

bioschemas.name: RCASPAR
bioschemas.summary: The package is the R-version of the C-based software \bold{CASPAR}. It is meant to help predict survival times in the presence of high-dimensional explanatory covariates.
